name: The Last Invader
description:
A classic vertical shmup rendered in beautiful 3D with original stonking tunes!

Description

Space isn't the final frontier...
The Last Invader takes you on a journey across four varied worlds. A classic shoot 'em up rendered in beautiful 3D, with dynamic lighting and shadows throughout, each world has its own unique character, challenges and music. Pick up power-ups and collect coins to buy vital upgrades for your ship after each level.

Features:

  • 3D graphics with dynamic lighting and shadows
  • 16 challenging levels across 4 beautiful and varied 3D worlds
  • Original stonking tunes!
  • Variety of power-ups
  • Collect coins to upgrade ship and buy power-ups
  • 3 difficulty levels and ships
  • NEW: Share your scores and achievements with Google+!!
  • NEW: Completely free to play all levels! No adverts, no pestering!
Game by @GingerCrabGames

http://www.gingercrab.com/

Send us your feedback!
